content.howToPlay: Begin by taking customer orders. Start with classic pasta types like Macaroni and Spaghetti.As you progress, you'll have the opportunity to cook other options such as Gnocchi, Ravioli, Fettuccine, Bowtie, Penne, and Radiatori.Cook the pasta according to the type specified in the order: al-dente or regular?Different pasta types have unique cooking times, so make sure to get it right for each dish.Once the pasta is cooked, move it to the Build Station to add the requested sauces and toppings. Alfredo, marinara or Bolognese? Customize each dish based on the customer's preferences. Drag and release to pour the sauces.Prepare and serve complementary bread items to complete the meal. This adds an extra touch that helps keep your customers happy. Garlic sticks, focaccia, and many more to explore in this station.Handle multiple orders by balancing preparation times and moving between stations all the time.Keep customers satisfied to earn better tips.Achieve bonuses for perfect orders, high customer satisfaction, and efficient service.Unlock new recipes and features as you reach milestones.

fullContent: Homeâ€º RestaurantPapa's PastariaBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenPapa's Pastaria takes you behind the counter of Papa Louie's pasta restaurant. As the head cook, waiter and the only employee of this restaurant, you're in charge of everything:Taking Customer Orders? That's you!Preparing and Cooking Pasta? All on you!Making the Sauces and Delivering Dishes? Yep, you handle it!Processing Payments? It's up to you!Upgrading the Restaurant with New Menus, Furniture, and Decorations? You've got it covered!The game's objective is to manage your time effectively while ensuring that each dish meets your customers' expectations. You'll need to cook pasta, add the right sauces, and include various toppings to create delicious meals.Each day at Pastaria brings new challenges, including different pasta types, complex orders, and increased customer expectations.Success is measured by your ability to keep up with orders and maintain high customer satisfaction, which in turn boosts your tips and helps grow your business.ControlsComputers & MobilesClick or tap to select itemsDrag and release to move itemsHow to Play Papa's PastariaBegin by taking customer orders. Start with classic pasta types like Macaroni and Spaghetti.As you progress, you'll have the opportunity to cook other options such as Gnocchi, Ravioli, Fettuccine, Bowtie, Penne, and Radiatori.Cook the pasta according to the type specified in the order: al-dente or regular?Different pasta types have unique cooking times, so make sure to get it right for each dish.Once the pasta is cooked, move it to the Build Station to add the requested sauces and toppings. Alfredo, marinara or Bolognese? Customize each dish based on the customer's preferences. Drag and release to pour the sauces.Prepare and serve complementary bread items to complete the meal. This adds an extra touch that helps keep your customers happy. Garlic sticks, focaccia, and many more to explore in this station.Handle multiple orders by balancing preparation times and moving between stations all the time.Keep customers satisfied to earn better tips.Achieve bonuses for perfect orders, high customer satisfaction, and efficient service.Unlock new recipes and features as you reach milestones.UpgradesInvest in kitchen upgrades, lobby decorations and many more to improve the efficiency, speed and waiting time of customers. Enhancements help you handle orders more effectively.Unlock new pasta types, ingredients, recipes, and restaurant decorations as you progress.DeveloperFlipline Studios created Papa's Pastaria.More Cooking GamesYou can play other Papa's games like Papa's Scooperia and Papa's Bakeria. Discover your options in restaurant games online.
